title: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Spaghetti, Eggs, Parmesan cheese, Pancetta, Black pepper
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs with cheese. Combine all and serve.

title: Chicken Alfredo
ingredients: Chicken, Fettuccine, Cream, Parmesan cheese, Garlic
instructions: Cook fettuccine. Grill chicken. Make Alfredo sauce. Combine and serve.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: Broccoli, Bell peppers, Carrots, Soy sauce, Garlic, Ginger
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables in a hot pan with garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce and serve with rice.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Ground beef, Taco seasoning, Tortillas, Lettuce, Tomato, Cheese
instructions: Cook beef with taco seasoning. Serve in tortillas with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: Cucumbers, Tomatoes, Red onions, Feta cheese, Olives, Olive oil, Oregano
instructions: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, and onions. Top with feta, olives, and a drizzle of olive oil. Sprinkle with oregano.

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: Chicken, Curry powder, Coconut milk, Onions, Garlic, Ginger, Tomatoes
instructions: Cook onions, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and curry powder. Stir in tomatoes and coconut milk. Simmer until chicken is cooked.

title: Pancakes
ingredients: Flour, Eggs, Milk, Baking powder, Sugar, Butter
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Whisk in eggs and milk. Cook pancakes on a hot griddle and serve with syrup.

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, Croutons, Parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing
instructions: Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing. Top with croutons and Parmesan cheese.

title: Margarita Pizza
ingredients: Pizza dough, Tomato sauce, Mozzarella cheese, Basil, Olive oil
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough. Top with mozzarella cheese and basil. Bake until crust is golden.
